item.title: Hack the Box — Starting Point — Meow Machine write up
item.description: Welcome to my first write-up on Hack the Box! In this article, I’ll guide you through the steps to conquer the “Meow” machine, a part of the ‘Starting Point’ labs with a ‘Very Easy’ difficulty rating.
